channel.title: Adding items to 667 zenithscape shop
channel.description: when i go into unpackedshops thing and delete item out of the shop and compile it, the item is still in shop when i log in. and also same thing when i try adding item in to shops it doesnt appear when i log in? really appreciate your help sinecerly kevin:) its a 667 zenithscape source thank u so so much:)

item.title: Adding items to 667 zenithscape shop
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

dfsg:

i did but why do u need to?>

You have to delete it, and compile the server, because all the shops are in packedShops.s
If you delete the file (and compile the server) the server will create a new file called “packedShops.s”, and if you remove everything from unpackedShops(.txt) there won’t be anything left in packedShops.s…
So, that means that all the shops that were added in unpackedShops will be removed (in-game).

Read full topic

You need to delete packedshops.s in \data\items
